Backend

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Backend.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Board class that is responsible for board and actions made on it.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yan Yan Ji, Robbie Southam, Hubert Rzeminski

      • updateBoard

        public FloorTile updateBoard(FloorTile newTile,
                             int col,
                             int row)
        It will shift everything according to the pushed floor tile onto the board.
        Parameters:
        newTile - Floor tile that is pushed.
        col - Index of column where the tile is pushed.
        row - Index of row where the tile is pushed.
        Returns:
        Floor tile that was pushed away.

      • isMovable

        public boolean isMovable(FloorTile[][] tiles,
                         boolean row,
                         int index)
        Checks if the row or column is movable.
        Parameters:
        tiles - Row or column of tile on the board.
        row - True if the column is pushed, false if the row is pushed.
        index - Index of row or column that is pushed.
        Returns:
        True if it can be moved, false otherwise.

      • shiftPlayers

        private void shiftPlayers(boolean column,
                          int index,
                          int move)
        Shift all the players that are on the pushed row or column.
        Parameters:
        column - True if the index is column, false otherwise.
        index - Index of row or column that is pushed.
        move - 1 or -1 to move.
